description: The operation to create or update the extension.

vm_name.description: The name of the virtual machine where the extension should be created or updated.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

vm_extension_name.description: The name of the virtual machine extension.

extension_parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Virtual Machine Extension operation.
